ModMetaData.name: Save File Compression
ModMetaData.author: AmCh
ModMetaData.description: Uses compression to save your game. 保存游戏时将存档打包压缩。 Vanilla's game save files are stored in plain text, this means that manually editing your save file is easy, but the save files can get to hundred(s) of Megabytes in size. 原版游戏存档都以文本保存，这样你手动编辑存档很容易，但也导致游戏存档可以达到上亿字节大小。 With this mod, the sizes get significantly shrunk to anywhere from 20% to 5% of the size of vanilla, saving your hard drive space. It can also speed up your saving process in some computers. 这个模组把你的存档压缩到20%到5%左右的大小，减少硬盘占用，也可以在一部分电脑里加快保存游戏的速度。
